title: Multilingual Translation Agent
description: Translates text between 50+ languages with per-character billing. Powered by LibreTranslate.

text.title: Text to Translate
text.description: The text you want translated. Maximum 5000 characters.

target_language.title: Target Language
target_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the language to translate TO (e.g., es for Spanish, fr for French, de for German, zh-hans for Chinese).

source_language.title: Source Language (Optional)
source_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the source language. Leave blank for auto-detection.

api_key.title: LibreTranslate API Key (Optional)
api_key.description: Only needed if you want to use your own LibreTranslate instance. Leave blank to use the default translation backend.
